Package org.forgerock.openam.radius.server.monitoring

Class RadiusServerEventRegistrar

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.radius.server.monitoring.RadiusServerEventRegistrar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RadiusServerEventMonitorMXBean, RadiusServerEventRegistrator
    public class RadiusServerEventRegistrar
extends Object
implements RadiusServerEventRegistrator, RadiusServerEventMonitorMXBean
    Collates information for JMX reporting and monitoring.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RadiusServerEventRegistrar

        @Inject
public RadiusServerEventRegistrar​(@Named("RadiusEventBus")
                                  com.google.common.eventbus.EventBus eventBus)
        Constructor. Registers this class with the radius events bus, such that it will be a subscriber to radius events. So that the radius packet and request statistics can be reported to JMX clients such as visualvm this class registers itself with the platforms MBean server. If this bean is already registered with the server, then it will be unregistered and then re-registered.
        Parameters:
        eventBus - - the event bus that this class will register as a subscriber with.

      • getNumberOfAcceptedPackets

        public long getNumberOfAcceptedPackets()
        Description copied from interface: RadiusServerEventMonitorMXBean
        get the number of packets accepted by the radius server. These are packets that were understood and hence not thrown away or ignored by the RADIUS server.
        Specified by:
        getNumberOfAcceptedPackets in interface RadiusServerEventMonitorMXBean
        Returns:
        a long indicating the no. of packets understood and accepted.

      • packetProcessed

        public long packetProcessed()
        Description copied from interface: RadiusServerEventRegistrator
        Notify the event Registrar that a packet has been processed. The authentication may have succeeded, or failed, but it has been processed to completion.
        Specified by:
        packetProcessed in interface RadiusServerEventRegistrator
        Returns:
        the total number of packets that have been processed.

      • getNumberOfPacketsProcessed

        public long getNumberOfPacketsProcessed()
        Description copied from interface: RadiusServerEventMonitorMXBean
        get the number of packets processed by the radius server (since started). These packets may have led to auth or been denied auth, but they were processed to completion, and hence not dropped, or failed in some way.
        Specified by:
        getNumberOfPacketsProcessed in interface RadiusServerEventMonitorMXBean
        Returns:
        a long indicating the number of packets processed.

      • authRequestAccepted

        public long authRequestAccepted()
        Description copied from interface: RadiusServerEventRegistrator
        Notify the event Registrar that an auth request has been accepted. That is an AccessAccept packet has been sent to the client in response to the AccessRequest.
        Specified by:
        authRequestAccepted in interface RadiusServerEventRegistrator
        Returns:
        the total number of authentication requests that have been accepted.
